verses.verse: Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Speak <S%H1696><s%> to all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and tell <S%H559><s%> them, <S%H6918><s%> 'You shall be holy; for I Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> am holy. <S%H6918><s%>

<S%H376><s%>"'Each one of you shall respect <S%H3372><s%> his mother <S%H517><s%> and his father. <S%H1><s%> You shall keep <S%H8104><s%> my Sabbaths. <S%H7676><s%> I am Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>
<S%H6437><s%>"'Don't turn to idols, <S%H457><s%> nor make <S%H6213><s%> molten <S%H4541><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> for yourselves. <S%H3068><s%> I am Yahweh your God. <S%H430><s%>
<S%H2076><s%>"'When you offer a sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace offerings <S%H8002><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> you shall offer <S%H2076><s%> it so that you may be accepted. <S%H7522><s%>

It shall be eaten <S%H398><s%> the same day <S%H3117><s%> you offer <S%H2077><s%> it, <S%H4283><s%> and on the next day: and if anything remains <S%H3498><s%> until the third <S%H7992><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> it shall be burned <S%H8313><s%> with fire. <S%H784><s%>
If it is eaten <S%H398><s%> at all <S%H398><s%> on the third <S%H7992><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> it is an abomination. <S%H6292><s%> It will not be accepted; <S%H7521><s%>

but everyone who eats <S%H398><s%> it shall bear <S%H5375><s%> his iniquity, <S%H5771><s%> because he has profaned <S%H2490><s%> the holy thing <S%H6944><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and that soul <S%H5315><s%> shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from his people. <S%H5971><s%>

<S%H7114><s%>"'When you reap the harvest <S%H7105><s%> of your land, <S%H776><s%> you shall not wholly reap <S%H3615><s%> the corners <S%H6285><s%> of your field, <S%H7704><s%> neither shall you gather <S%H3950><s%> the gleanings <S%H3951><s%> of your harvest. <S%H7105><s%>

You shall not glean <S%H5953><s%> your vineyard, <S%H3754><s%> neither shall you gather <S%H3950><s%> the fallen grapes <S%H6528><s%> of your vineyard; <S%H3754><s%> you shall leave <S%H5800><s%> them for the poor <S%H6041><s%> and for the foreigner. <S%H1616><s%> I am Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>
<S%H1589><s%>"'You shall not steal. <S%H8266><s%>"'You shall not lie. <S%H8266><s%>"'You shall not deceive one <S%H376><s%> another. <S%H5997><s%>
<S%H7650><s%>"'You shall not swear by my name <S%H8034><s%> falsely, <S%H8267><s%> and profane <S%H2490><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of your God. <S%H430><s%> I am Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

<S%H6231><s%>"'You shall not oppress your neighbor, <S%H7453><s%> nor rob <S%H1497><s%> him. <S%H6468><s%> "'The wages of a hired <S%H7916><s%> servant shall not remain <S%H3885><s%> with you all night until the morning. <S%H1242><s%>

<S%H7043><s%>"'You shall not curse the deaf, <S%H2795><s%> nor put <S%H5414><s%> a stumbling <S%H4383><s%> block before <S%H6440><s%> the blind; <S%H5787><s%> but you shall fear <S%H3372><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%> I am Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

<S%H6213><s%>"'You shall do no injustice <S%H5766><s%> in judgment: <S%H4941><s%> you shall not be partial <S%H5375><s%> to the <S%H6440><s%> poor, <S%H1800><s%> nor show favoritism <S%H1921><s%> to the <S%H6440><s%> great; <S%H1419><s%> but you shall judge <S%H8199><s%> your neighbor <S%H5997><s%> in righteousness. <S%H6664><s%>

<S%H3212><s%>"'You shall not go up and down as a slanderer <S%H7400><s%> among your people. <S%H5971><s%> <S%H5975><s%>"'You shall not endanger the life <S%H1818><s%> of your neighbor. <S%H7453><s%> I am Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

<S%H8130><s%>"'You shall not hate your brother <S%H251><s%> in your heart. <S%H3824><s%> You shall surely <S%H3198><s%> rebuke <S%H3198><s%> your neighbor, <S%H5997><s%> and not bear <S%H5375><s%> sin because of him. <S%H2399><s%>

<S%H5358><s%>"'You shall not take vengeance, nor bear any grudge <S%H5201><s%> against the children <S%H1121><s%> of your people; <S%H5971><s%> but you shall love <S%H157><s%> your neighbor <S%H7453><s%> as yourself. <S%H3644><s%> I am Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

<S%H8104><s%>"'You shall keep my statutes. <S%H2708><s%> <S%H7250><s%>"'You shall not crossbreed different kinds <S%H3610><s%> of animals. <S%H929><s%> <S%H2232><s%>"'you shall not sow your field <S%H7704><s%> with two kinds of seed; <S%H3610><s%> <S%H5927><s%>"'neither shall there come upon on you a garment <S%H899><s%> made of two <S%H3610><s%> kinds of material. <S%H8162><s%>

<S%H376><s%>"'If a man lies <S%H7901><s%> carnally <S%H2233><s%> with a woman <S%H802><s%> who is a slave <S%H8198><s%> girl, <S%H2778><s%> pledged to be married to another man, <S%H376><s%> and not <S%H6299><s%> ransomed, <S%H6299><s%> or given <S%H5414><s%> her freedom; <S%H2668><s%> they shall be punished. <S%H1244><s%> They shall not be put to death, <S%H4191><s%> because she was not free. <S%H2666><s%>

He shall bring <S%H935><s%> his trespass offering <S%H817><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> to the door <S%H6607><s%> of the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting, <S%H4150><s%> even a ram <S%H352><s%> for a trespass offering. <S%H817><s%>

The priest <S%H3548><s%> shall make atonement <S%H3722><s%> for him with the ram <S%H352><s%> of the trespass offering <S%H817><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> for his sin <S%H2403><s%> which he has committed: <S%H2398><s%> and the sin <S%H2403><s%> which he has committed <S%H2398><s%> shall be forgiven him. <S%H5545><s%>

<S%H935><s%>"'When you come into the land, <S%H776><s%> and have planted <S%H5193><s%> all kinds of trees <S%H6086><s%> for food, <S%H3978><s%> then you shall count <S%H6188><s%> their fruit <S%H6529><s%> as forbidden. <S%H6188><s%> Three <S%H7969><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> shall they be forbidden <S%H6189><s%> to you. <S%H398><s%> It shall not be eaten.
But in the fourth <S%H7243><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> all its fruit <S%H6529><s%> shall be holy, <S%H6944><s%> for giving praise <S%H1974><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

In the fifth <S%H2549><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> you shall eat <S%H398><s%> its fruit, <S%H6529><s%> that it may yield <S%H3254><s%> its increase <S%H8393><s%> to you. <S%H3068><s%> I am Yahweh your God. <S%H430><s%>
<S%H398><s%>"'You shall not eat any meat with the blood <S%H1818><s%> still in it; <S%H5172><s%> neither shall you use enchantments, nor practice sorcery. <S%H6049><s%>
<S%H5362><s%>"'You shall not cut the hair on the sides <S%H6285><s%> of your heads, <S%H7218><s%> neither shall you clip <S%H7843><s%> off the edge <S%H6285><s%> of your beard. <S%H2206><s%>

<S%H5414><s%>"'You shall not make any <S%H3793><s%> cuttings <S%H8296><s%> in your flesh <S%H1320><s%> for the dead, <S%H5315><s%> nor tattoo <S%H5414><s%> any marks <S%H7085><s%> on you. <S%H3068><s%> I am Yahweh.

<S%H2490><s%>"'Don't profane your daughter, <S%H1323><s%> to make her a prostitute; <S%H2490><s%> lest the land <S%H776><s%> fall to prostitution, <S%H2181><s%> and the land <S%H776><s%> become full <S%H4390><s%> of wickedness. <S%H2154><s%>
<S%H8104><s%>"'You shall keep my Sabbaths, <S%H7676><s%> and reverence <S%H3372><s%> my sanctuary; <S%H4720><s%> I am Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

<S%H6437><s%>"'Don't turn to those who are mediums, <S%H178><s%> nor to the wizards. <S%H3049><s%> Don't <S%H1245><s%> seek them out, <S%H2930><s%> to be defiled by them. <S%H3068><s%> I am Yahweh your God. <S%H430><s%>

<S%H6965><s%>"'You shall rise up before <S%H6440><s%> the gray head, <S%H7872><s%> and honor <S%H1921><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of an old man, <S%H2205><s%> and you shall fear <S%H3372><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%> I am Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
<S%H1616><s%>"'If a stranger lives as a foreigner <S%H1616><s%> with you in your land, <S%H776><s%> you shall not do him wrong. <S%H3238><s%>

The stranger <S%H1616><s%> who lives <S%H1481><s%> as a foreigner with you shall be to you as the native-born <S%H249><s%> among you, <S%H157><s%> and you shall love him as yourself; <S%H1616><s%> for you lived as foreigners in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%> I am Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>
<S%H6213><s%>"'You shall do no unrighteousness <S%H5766><s%> in judgment, <S%H4941><s%> in measures <S%H4884><s%> of length, <S%H4948><s%> of weight, or of quantity. <S%H4884><s%>

You shall have just <S%H6664><s%> balances, <S%H3976><s%> just <S%H6664><s%> weights, <S%H68><s%> a just <S%H6664><s%> ephah, <S%H374><s%> and a just <S%H6664><s%> hin. <S%H1969><s%> I am Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> who brought you out <S%H3318><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>
<S%H8104><s%>"'You shall observe all my statutes, <S%H2708><s%> and all my ordinances, <S%H4941><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> them. <S%H3068><s%> I am Yahweh.'"
